body:
I am developing an _uber_ package that represents the suite of meshing and numerical libraries in the FASTMath SciDAC project. It has ~20 sub-package dependencies.

Fine and good.

But, whenever I go to build that uber package, I get a couple of screenfulls of echos...

/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc
/Users/miller86/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastmath/package.pyc

Same thing happens if I do the command `spack graph fastmath`. It spews a ton of these lines before it prints the graph.
title: Uber package results in many echos of package.py file path
